new(*args)

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 201
201:       def initialize(*args)
202:         raise Error, "Options should be given after the application name. For details run: rails --help" if args[0].blank?
203: 
204:         @original_wd = Dir.pwd
205: 
206:         super
207: 
208:         if !options[:skip_active_record] && !DATABASES.include?(options[:database])
209:           raise Error, "Invalid value for --database option. Supported for preconfiguration are: #{DATABASES.join(", ")}."
210:         end
211:       end

apply_rails_template()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 299
299:       def apply_rails_template
300:         apply rails_template if rails_template
301:       rescue Thor::Error, LoadError, Errno::ENOENT => e
302:         raise Error, "The template [#{rails_template}] could not be loaded. Error: #{e}"
303:       end

305:       def bundle_if_dev_or_edge
306:         bundle_command = File.basename(Thor::Util.ruby_command).sub(/ruby/, 'bundle')
307:         run "#{bundle_command} install" if dev_or_edge?
308:       end

create_root()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 213
213:       def create_root
214:         self.destination_root = File.expand_path(app_path, destination_root)
215:         valid_app_const?
216: 
217:         empty_directory '.'
218:         set_default_accessors!
219:         FileUtils.cd(destination_root) unless options[:pretend]
220:       end

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 370
370:       def app_const_base
371:         @app_const_base ||= defined_app_const_base || app_name.gsub(/\W/, '_').squeeze('_').camelize
372:       end

build(meth, *args)

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 335
335:       def build(meth, *args)
336:         builder.send(meth, *args) if builder.respond_to?(meth)
337:       end
builder()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 316
316:       def builder
317:         @builder ||= begin
318:           if path = options[:builder]
319:             if URI(path).is_a?(URI::HTTP)
320:               contents = open(path, "Accept" => "application/x-thor-template") {|io| io.read }
321:             else
322:               contents = open(File.expand_path(path, @original_wd)) {|io| io.read }
323:             end
324: 
325:             prok = eval("proc { #{contents} }", TOPLEVEL_BINDING, path, 1)
326:             instance_eval(&prok)
327:           end
328: 
329:           builder_class = defined?(::AppBuilder) ? ::AppBuilder : Rails::AppBuilder
330:           builder_class.send(:include, ActionMethods)
331:           builder_class.new(self)
332:         end
333:       end
defined_app_const_base()
This method is also aliased as defined_app_const_base?

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 363
363:       def defined_app_const_base
364:         Rails.respond_to?(:application) && defined?(Rails::Application) &&
365:           Rails.application.is_a?(Rails::Application) && Rails.application.class.name.sub(/::Application$/, "")
366:       end

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 428
428:       def empty_directory_with_gitkeep(destination, config = {})
429:         empty_directory(destination, config)

431:       end
file(*args, &block)

Define file as an alias to create_file for backwards compatibility.

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 351
351:       def file(*args, &block)

gem_for_database()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 396
396:       def gem_for_database
397:         # %w( mysql oracle postgresql sqlite3 frontbase ibm_db )
398:         case options[:database]
399:         when "oracle"     then "ruby-oci8"
400:         when "postgresql" then "pg"
401:         when "sqlite3"    then "sqlite3-ruby"
402:         when "frontbase"  then "ruby-frontbase"
403:         when "mysql"      then "mysql2"
404:         else options[:database]
405:         end
406:       end
mysql_socket()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 414
414:       def mysql_socket
415:         @mysql_socket ||= [
416:           "/tmp/mysql.sock",                        # default
417:           "/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock",            # debian/gentoo
418:           "/var/tmp/mysql.sock",                    # freebsd
419:           "/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock",              # fedora
420:           "/opt/local/lib/mysql/mysql.sock",        # fedora
421:           "/opt/local/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock",  # mac + darwinports + mysql
422:           "/opt/local/var/run/mysql4/mysqld.sock",  # mac + darwinports + mysql4
423:           "/opt/local/var/run/mysql5/mysqld.sock",  # mac + darwinports + mysql5
424:           "/opt/lampp/var/mysql/mysql.sock"         # xampp for linux
425:         ].find { |f| File.exist?(f) } unless RbConfig::CONFIG['host_os'] =~ /mswin|mingw/
426:       end
require_for_database()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 408
408:       def require_for_database
409:         case options[:database]
410:         when "sqlite3" then "sqlite3"
411:         end
412:       end
set_default_accessors!()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 339
339:       def set_default_accessors!
340:         self.rails_template = case options[:template]
341:           when /^http:\/\//
342:             options[:template]
343:           when String
344:             File.expand_path(options[:template], Dir.pwd)
345:           else
346:             options[:template]
347:         end
348:       end
valid_app_const?()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/generators/rails/app/app_generator.rb, line 378
378:       def valid_app_const?
379:         if app_const =~ /^\d/
380:           raise Error, "Invalid application name #{app_name}. Please give a name which does not start with numbers."
381:         elsif RESERVED_NAMES.include?(app_name)
382:           raise Error, "Invalid application name #{app_name}. Please give a name which does not match one of the reserved rails words."
383:         elsif Object.const_defined?(app_const_base)
384:           raise Error, "Invalid application name #{app_name}, constant #{app_const_base} is already in use. Please choose another application name."
385:         end
386:       end
